title: Garden Rotini Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1/2 large seedless cucumber or 3 mini ones

instructions.text: Boil water and cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and rinse with cold water to cool (otherwise the cheese will melt).
Cut cheese into small cubes. Cut pepperoni into halves. Dice bell pepper and cucumber. Drain and rinse beans.
Mix pasta, cheese, pepperoni, olives, bell pepper, cucumber, and at least half the can of beans in a large bowl.
Add italian dressing to taste (start with about 1/3 of bottle) and stir. Refrigerate at least a half hour before serving.
